text.speaker: narrator
text.message:
After half an hour of walking, you can finally see the forest start to clear.
Sitting in the valley is a grand piano.

text.speaker: friend
text.message: Why would anyone leave a perfectly good piano here?

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You shrug, walking up closer to examine the piano.

text.speaker: Gilbert (piano)
text.message: My name's Gilbert, it's been ages since I was played.
Gilbert: Could you tickle my keys?

partials.46dbf03d5f80db1aced1c82f0db3d2a2db25c02f: That's nice I guess...it doesn't quite scratch the itch thou

text.answer_response: Glibert: Yes, Garchomp is my favourite pokemon! Isn't he such an adorable chunky boy?

text.speaker: Gilbert
text.message: I'm in a nice mood after all the playing you gave me, take one!

text.speaker: narrator
text.message:
I think we're all done here, letâ€™s set off our next location: The Last Drop
I've heard they got good beer
